statement.p: Find the area of the quadrilateral shown. The lengths of the four sides (counterclockwise) are \displaystyle{a}={5.1} , \displaystyle{b}={8.1}, \displaystyle{c}={10.7}, and \displaystyle{d}={13.1}, with diagonal from first to third point \displaystyle{e}={9.8}. Measurements are in yards. What is the area of this figure?
